column1: Little Goat Diner////Attempted to get breakfast here on a Saturday without a reservation (crazy thought
column3: the place was paaacked. I don't dig excessively long waits for brunch. Instead of waiting at the diner
column4: I waded through the sardine-like-packed LG Bakery next door and picked up some bread and baked goods (which were great
column7: and then immediately made a reservation to come back to the diner.
